title: Lake Chelan National Recreation Area: Maps
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps              Maps      Â      A young man and woman consult a map in their campsite at the Colonial Creek Campground before taking a day hike. NPS/NOCA/David Snyder  PARK MAPS  North Cascades National Park Complex (7 MB) Surrounding Region (61 KB) State Route 20 Detail (721 KB) Ross Lake (11 MB PDF, jpg 393 KB) Stehekin (700 KB)    CAMPGROUND MAPS  Goodell Creek Campground (520 KB) Lower Goodell Creek Group Camps (200 KB) Upper Goodell Creek Group Camp (coming soon)  Newhalem Campground (320 KB) Gorge Lake Campground (1 MB) Colonial Creek Campground (520 KB) Hozomeen Campground (103 KB)   BACKCOUNTRY TRIP PLANNING  Wilderness Trip Planner Map (2.8 MB)  REGIONAL TRIP PLANNING Learn more about the exploring the Cascade Loop at http://www.cascadeloop.com/   All maps are available as Adobe PDFs.
